sentences: Helena Noguerra (18 May 1969) is a Belgian actress, singer and writer.
Noguerra was born in Brussels, Belgium.
Her songs have been used in commercials and television programmes such as Lunettes noires pour nuits blanches by Thierry Ardisson (1988â€“1990).
She sang on the 2009 video game Bayonetta, including both the game's main theme Mysterious Destiny and a cover of Fly Me to the Moon.
She has a son, Tanel Derard, born in 1991, a musician and model.
